column4: when i close firefox is normal that the process firefox-bin still continue working?
I have terminal, beryl, firefox ,monitor and this chat, i have 750 ddr ram but is working difficult?
256 MB is enough for gnome at least
if a have 750 on ram an a NVIDIA 128 video card  6200 is normal that the system is slowing?
you can also have slownes if you have i/o issues
no, that's much faster than my system
check your logs to see if something really awry is going on
also, you can check your memory usage with free -m (count the -/+ buffers/cache line as your memory usage)
high i/o would be e.g. if something is constantly accessing the disk, which causes other applications that need to use the disk to slow down
i have windows XP(because of my sister) and today the power went off  when she was working there.
check the output of dmesg and the logs in /var/log, sometiems the kernel will complain if it detects hardware issues
I'm sorry to bother i know it can be annoying but i'm learning a lot thanks
check to see if there are any errors (probably near the end)
